column4: I have apache/php/sql installed on my windows machine, how can I browse to this from my ubuntu computer? I have tried //mike and xx.xx.xx.xx ip address from the address bar :|
is the windows box a WAMP server for real?  Is there a firewall stopping it?
it just has WAMP installed on it, its not being accessed externally. I am in uni halls tho, so I am unsure how the network works
well, if you can't browse in a browser to the box, then it's not serving out right
